Item.name: Avira
Item.Description: Good free antivirus

Item.name: AVG
Item.Description: Good free antivirus

Item.name: Voodoo Shield
Item.Description: VoodooShield is a security program that is unlike most traditional anti-virus programs. Instead of scanning your computer for known malware or using definition files to detect infections, VoodooShield instead locks your computer so that you are notified when an unknown process is started.

Item.name: Malwarebytes Anti-Rootkit
Item.Description: Malwarebytes Anti-Rootkit is a free program that can be used to search for and remove rootkits from your computer.

Item.name: Microsoft Security Essentials x86
Item.Description: If you’re looking to protect a PC with an older version of running Windows 7, you can use Microsoft Security Essentials to provide comprehensive malware protection that will help guard against viruses, spyware, and other malicious software.

Item.name: Microsoft Security Essentials x64
Item.Description: If you’re looking to protect a PC with an older version of running Windows 7, you can use Microsoft Security Essentials to provide comprehensive malware protection that will help guard against viruses, spyware, and other malicious software.

Item.name: REM-VBSworm
Item.Description: Rem-VBSworm is a utility that removes VBS and Windows Script Host malware from your computer, USB drives, and the network.

Item.name: Sophos
Item.Description: Sophos Virus Removal Tool Detects and Removes Computer Threats Including Malware, Viruses, Ransomware, Worms, Trojans and Rootkits.

Item.name: TDSSKiller
Item.Description: TDSSKiller is a utility created by Kaspersky Labs that is designed to remove the TDSS rootkit.

Item.name: VIPRE Rescue
Item.Description: VIPRE Rescue is a handy, easy to use tool designed to clean your computer if you are already infected with a virus and your operating system is not working properly as a result of the infection.

Item.name: Zemana
Item.Description: Zemana AntiMalware is a cloud based malware scanner that provides excellent malware detection, quick scans, and easy malware removal.

Item.name: Clamwin
Item.Description: ClamWin is a Free Antivirus program for Microsoft Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP / Me / 2000 / 98 and Windows Server 2012, 2008 and 2003.

Item.name: Scancl
Item.Description: Avira Command Line Scanner

Item.name: AdwCleaner
Item.Description: AdwCleaner is a program that searches for and deletes Adware, Toolbars, Potentially Unwanted Programs (PUP), and browser Hijackers from your computer.

Item.name: Emsisoft Emergency Kit
Item.Description: Emsisoft Emergency Kit is a collection of standalone security programs and scanners that can be run from a USB key, bootable CD/DVD, or from within Windows Safe Mode without having to download and install a full security product.

Item.name: HitmanPro
Item.Description: HitmanPro is an anti-virus program that describes itself as a second opinion scanner that should be used in conjunction with another anti-virus program that you may already have installed.

Item.name: HitmanPro x64
Item.Description: HitmanPro is an anti-virus program that describes itself as a second opinion scanner that should be used in conjunction with another anti-virus program that you may already have installed.

Item.name: Junk Removal Tool
Item.Description: Junkware Removal Tool is a security utility that searches for and removes common adware, toolbars, and potentially unwanted programs (PUPs)

Item.name: Malwarebytes Antimalware
Item.Description: Malwarebytes protects you against malware, ransomware, and other advanced online threats that have made antivirus obsolete and ineffective.

Item.name: RogueKiller
Item.Description: RogueKiller is an anti-malware able to detect and remove generic malware and advanced threats like rootkits, rogues, worms.

Item.name: RogueKiller x64
Item.Description: RogueKiller is an anti-malware able to detect and remove generic malware and advanced threats like rootkits, rogues, worms.

Item.name: RogueKiller CMD
Item.Description: RogueKiller is an anti-malware able to detect and remove generic malware and advanced threats like rootkits, rogues, worms.

Item.name: RogueKiller CMD x64
Item.Description: RogueKiller is an anti-malware able to detect and remove generic malware and advanced threats like rootkits, rogues, worms.

Item.name: Super Antispyware
Item.Description: SUPERAntiSpyware is a free anti-spyware program that offers excellent detections and quick removal of common infections.

Item.name: CCleaner
Item.Description: CCleaner is a program that will scan your computer for temporary files or private browser information and deletes it from your computer.

Item.name: CCleaner x64
Item.Description: CCleaner is a program that will scan your computer for temporary files or private browser information and deletes it from your computer.

Item.name: Delfix
Item.Description: DelFix is designed to delete all removal tools used during a disinfection.

Item.name: PC-Decrapifier
Item.Description: The PC Decrapifier is a free tool that helps remove programs, unnecessary startup items that can slow down your PC. It takes you step by step, giving you recommendations on what to remove, many of which can be removed unattended.

Item.name: Revo Uninstaller
Item.Description: Revo Uninstaller Pro helps you to uninstall software and remove unwanted programs installed on your computer easily!

Item.name: Shortcut Cleaner
Item.Description: Shortcut Cleaner is a utility that will scan your computer for Windows shortcuts that have been hijacked by unwanted or malicious software.

Item.name: AVG Remover
Item.Description: AVG Remover is the last option to be used in case the AVG uninstall / repair installation process has failed

Item.name: McAfee Removal Tool
Item.Description: The MCPR tool is designed to cleanup McAfee Consumer products when standard windows un-installation steps fail.

Item.name: Norton Removal Tool
Item.Description: The Norton Remove and Reinstall tool uninstalls most Norton products, and reinstalls the latest version.

Item.name: Heimdal
Item.Description: Heimdal FREE keeps your vulnerable applications up to date automatically and eliminates vulnerabilities used in cyber attacks.

Item.name: Java Runtime Environment
Item.Description: If you want to run Java programs, but not develop them, download the Java Runtime Environment, or JRE

Item.name: Java Runtime Environment x64
Item.Description: If you want to run Java programs, but not develop them, download the Java Runtime Environment, or JRE

Item.name: LibreOffice
Item.Description: LibreOffice is a powerful office suite – its clean interface and feature-rich tools help you unleash your creativity and enhance your productivity.

Item.name: OpenOffice
Item.Description: Apache OpenOffice is the leading open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, graphics, databases and more.

Item.name: Adobe Reader
Item.Description: PDF reader from Adobe

Item.name: Unchecky
Item.Description: Unchecky aims to keep potentially unwanted programs out of your computer.

Item.name: Ninite Windows 7
Item.Description: Installer for many basic application for Windows 7, including: LibreOffice, Chrome, VLC, CDBurnerXP, and Microsoft Security Essentials.

Item.name: Ninite Windows 8-10
Item.Description: Installer for many basic application for Windows 8, including: LibreOffice, Chrome, VLC, CDBurnerXP, and Classic Shell.

Item.name: Blue Screen View
Item.Description: BlueScreenView scans all your minidump files created during 'blue screen of death' crashes, and displays the information about all crashes in one table.

Item.name: Blue Screen View x64
Item.Description: BlueScreenView scans all your minidump files created during 'blue screen of death' crashes, and displays the information about all crashes in one table.

Item.name: Crystal Disk Info
Item.Description: A HDD/SSD utility software which supports a part of USB connection and Intel RAID.

Item.name: Crystal Disk Info x64
Item.Description: A HDD/SSD utility software which supports a part of USB connection and Intel RAID.

Item.name: HDD Scan
Item.Description: HDDScan is a Free test tool for hard disk drives, USB flash, RAID volumes and SSD drives.

Item.name: Produkey
Item.Description: HDDScan is a Free test tool for hard disk drives, USB flash, RAID volumes and SSD drives.

Item.name: Windows Repair All-in-One
Item.Description: General repair tool for the Windows operating system.

Item.name: Registry Backup
Item.Description: Backs up the system registry.

Item.name: Simple System Tweaker
Item.Description: Makes simple tweaks to help improve system performance.

Item.name: Shadow Explorer
Item.Description: You can restore lost or damaged files from Shadow Copies. However, it is by no means a replacement for traditional backups!

Item.name: Speccy
Item.Description: Look inside your PC and find all its hardware specs with Speccy from Piriform.

Item.name: Speccy x64
Item.Description: Look inside your PC and find all its hardware specs with Speccy from Piriform.

Item.name: TCP View
Item.Description: TCPView is a Windows program that will show you detailed listings of all TCP and UDP endpoints on your system, including the local and remote addresses and state of TCP connections.

Item.name: WMI Explorer
Item.Description: WMI Explorer is a utility intended to provide the ability to browse and view WMI namespaces/classes/instances/properties in a single pane of view and is inspired by the PowerShell based WMI Explorer written by Marc.

Item.name: Belarc Advisor
Item.Description: The Belarc Advisor builds a detailed profile of your installed software and hardware, network inventory, any missing Microsoft hotfixes, anti-virus status, security benchmarks, and displays the results in your Web browser.

Item.name: Blitz Blank
Item.Description: BlitzBlank is an advanced system administration tool that allows you to disable drivers, delete files, folders, Windows Registry keys and values that are in-use or locked by malware.

Item.name: Combofix
Item.Description: ComboFix is a program, created by sUBs, that scans your computer for known malware, and when found, attempts to clean these infections automatically.

Item.name: DDS
Item.Description: DDS is a program that will scan your computer and create logs that can be used to display various startup, configuration, and file information from your computer.

Item.name: Defraggler
Item.Description: Defrag entire hard drives or individual files. Works with HDD and SSD and supports NTFS and FAT32 file systems!

Item.name: Fix Exec
Item.Description: FixExec is a program that is designed to fix executable file associations for the .bat, .exe, and .com file extensions.

Item.name: Fix Exec x64
Item.Description: FixExec is a program that is designed to fix executable file associations for the .bat, .exe, and .com file extensions.

Item.name: Farbar Service Scanner
Item.Description: Farbar Service Scanner allows you to diagnose network connectivity issues due to corrupted or missing Windows services.

Item.name: Furmark
Item.Description: FurMark is a very intensive OpenGL benchmark that uses fur rendering algorithms to measure the performance of the graphics card.

Item.name: GlassWire
Item.Description: GlassWire reveals hosts that are known threats, unexpected network system file changes, unusual application changes, ARP spoofing, DNS changes, and alerts you to the problem so you can take action.

Item.name: Magic Jellybean Keyfinder
Item.Description: The Magical Jelly Bean Keyfinder is a freeware utility that retrieves your Product Key (cd key) used to install windows from your registry.

Item.name: Malwarebytes Anti-Exploit
Item.Description: Malwarebytes will continue to test cutting-edge anti-exploit technology in a free beta version of Malwarebytes Anti-Exploit.

Item.name: Net Adapter Repair
Item.Description: NetAdapter Repair All In One is a utility that acts as a Swiss army knife for network related Windows tasks.

Item.name: OldTimer ListIt
Item.Description: OTL, or OldTimer ListIt, is a tool that is used to diagnose a computer for a possible malware presence and to provide system diagnostics information that can by someone working on a computer.

Item.name: Patch My PC
Item.Description: Patch My PC Updater is a free, easy-to-use program that keeps over 100 programs up-to-date on your computer.

Item.name: MiniTool Data Recovery
Item.Description: Patch My PC Updater is a free, easy-to-use program that keeps over 100 programs up-to-date on your computer.

Item.name: Putty
Item.Description: PuTTY is an SSH and telnet client, developed originally by Simon Tatham for the Windows platform.

Item.name: Recuva
Item.Description: Recuva recovers files from your Windows computer, recycle bin, digital camera card, or MP3 player!

Item.name: Resource Hacker
Item.Description: Resource Hacker™ has been designed to be the complete resource editing tool: compiling, viewing, decompiling and recompiling resources for both 32bit and 64bit Windows executables.

Item.name: RKill
Item.Description: RKill is a program that was developed at BleepingComputer.com that attempts to terminate known malware processes so that your normal security software can then run and clean your computer of infections

Item.name: Security Check
Item.Description: SecurityCheck is a program that searches for installed and running security programs on a user's program.

Item.name: Temp File Cleaner
Item.Description: TFC. or Temp File Cleaner, is a small utility that will clean out all the folders on your computer that house temporary files.

Item.name: IObit Unlocker
Item.Description: IObit Unlocker is a free program that allows you to unlock in use or locked files so that you delete, rename, or move them.

Item.name: WinDirStat
Item.Description: WinDirStat scans one or more hard drives and produces a detailed map or the disk making space hogs immediately apparent.
